Summary: Saw a circle of white light travel very quickly from east to west and dissappear behind a mountain.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the afternoon of April 7,2010 my wife and I were traveling south in our car on Hwy 77 somewhere past Globe, AZ. We saw a large circular white light appear in the distance (guessing 2-3 miles) moving at a high speed from east to west in a straight steady line and then dissapear behind a mountain. We both saw this at the same time and aggreed a about what we saw. It was traveling lower than the mountain tops. This object caught our attention immediately and was with out a doubt a UFO. UFOs' are no surprise to us and we thought it was cool to see one.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Globe
There were no other sightings in Globe on or around November 30th 2002
